name: BAART - Bay Area Addiction Research & Treatment Inc.  (Main Office)
description: Opioid treatment programs (OTPs) are considered essential medical facilities and BAART will continue to provide addiction treatment services to BAART's patients. Telehealth or other remote options for counseling or physician visits will be implemented upon individual state approval. Expanded parameters for take-home medication will be implemented as they are updated by individual state authorities. BAART continues to accept new admissions.
